Detailed Description

This class loads general game configuration information (e.g.

controls, display resolution, fullscreen modee, etc.).

Member Function Documentation

configmanager.ConfigManager.config

Maps config keys to their values.

configmanager.ConfigManager.controls

Maps action names (e.g.

'jump', 'left') to PyGame key identifiers.
